summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 17
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Friday, with 11 gaining and seven declining.
Bitcoin rose 0.8% to $24,759 by market close.
